thread.title: 'Anyone could be a terrorist' for UK police at royal wedding

title: 'Anyone could be a terrorist' for UK police at royal wedding
text:
'Anyone could be a terrorist' for UK police at royal wedding 9:10am BST - 01:38 
When more than 100,000 flag-waving, cheering royal fans gather for the wedding of Britain's Prince Harry to his American fiance Meghan Markle next month, police will be treating every one as a potential terrorist, prankster or royal obsessive. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
